title: 2018 Ram 2500 Heavy Duty 6.7L Turbo Diesel
item_description:
2018 Ram 2500 Heavy Duty 6.7L Turbo Diesel

Specifications

  • Year: 2018
  • Make: Ram
  • Model: 2500 Heavy Duty
  • VIN: 3C6UR5DL9JG278005
  • License: 57510W3
    • Registration Expiration: 11/30/2025
  • Odometer Reads: 98,182 (will increase after smog)
  • Key: Available
  • GVWR: 10,000 Lbs
  • Drive Type: AWD/4WD
  • Engine: Cummins 6.7L OHV 24V Turbo Diesel
  • Body Style: Truck
  • Fuel Type: Diesel
  • Transmission: 6-Speed Automatic
  • Tire Size: LT275/70R18
  • Deck Length: 73”
  • Deck Width: 64”
  • Wall Height: 19”

Exterior

  • Doors: Four Door

Interior

  • Interior Color: Gray
  • Features:
    • Backup Camera
    • Bluetooth Hands-Free
    • Cruise Control
    • Multi-Zone Climate Control
    • Navigation
    • Power Locks
    • Power Windows
    • Power Mirrors
    • Premium Wheels

    • Touch Screen
    • Bed Liner

Note: This vehicle was repossessed by the Bank; the Certificate of Title, Certificate of Repossession, Transfer Form, and smog certificate will be mailed within 1 week after pickup. Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of the transfer, registration, taxes, and fees due to DMV.
